answers.answer: 30 weeks to check babies growth because I hadn't gained any weight.
20wks with my daughter and it will be 20wks again with this one
Well my last one was 20wks. But yesterday I had one cause I'm over due and they needed to check the weight and amniotic fluid.

My last one was at 12 weeks well because thier heartbeat machine didn't work so they tried it with the ultrasound. My baby was so tiny ^.^ & I saw his leg and his face a little bit. Ihave a pic on my photos. My next real ultrasound is this tuesday & imma be 13 weeks 5 days (:
My last one was at 31 weeks.
36 weeks to check size of baby and placenta location.
I got one at 36 weeks with my son. But that was mostly cause i have a really short torso and they wanted to make sure he wasnt caught anywhere near my ribs.

Hmm thats odd, i was supposed to get my last one at 28 weeks but i guess they didnt schedule for it, so i have to wait until my next app to ask the doc when will it happen which will be in 4 weeks ill be 30-31 weeks. :( im anxious cuz this one is in 3d for free. (:

Depends on your doctor and your circumstances. My first doctor did one every time I go in they did it for everyone. But after 20 weeks I switched to a midwife so they were going to do any more. But since I got diagnosed with gd I will be getting 1 a week until I deliver. This starts tomorrow I'll be 35+5
my last one was at 12 weeks in 17 weeks and 6 days can't wait to find out the gender
I'll be going for my last ultrasound next week and I'll be 38weeks
Last one was at 20 weeks I'm now 38
I just got one yesterday at 36 weeks because I have gestational diabetes and they wanted to measure her.(:

question: When was your ladies last ultrasound at how many weeks?
title: the last ultrasound?
